overview: After hibernating all winter, bears come out to feast and forage in the forest while the furry, two-legged variety goes Bear-Backing in Provincetown. There, amidst the sandy dunes, forested areas, and quaint B&Bs of the sleepy, New England spot, Daddy Cub, Steve Sommers, Daddy Lucas, Rock Hunter, Tate Taylor, Skott Locke and Sebastian Sax turn P-town into a hedonistic breeding ground for horny men cavorting in the warmth of the sun.
title: Barebacking in Provincetown
